CustomField.description: One-off and One-off from products must match to set opportunity to stage 'Closed Won'. Check that the contract start date has been set.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Type,"Existing Business-Professional Services"), ROUND(One_off_from_Products__c,2) = ROUND(One_off__c, 2)), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150P000005PRdt","YES"), IF( ROUND(One_off_from_Products__c,2) = ROUND(One_off__c, 2), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150P000005PRdt","YES"), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150P000005PRcW", "NO") ))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Green: Okay Red: One-off does not match One-off from Products
CustomField.label: Check - One off & One off from products
